Auth model: No API key; client identification required via ET-Client-Name header.
Rate limits: Not published; strict rate limiting for unidentified clients.
Update frequency: Real-time info included; cadence not stated.
GTFS/NeTEx/SIRI support: Not stated for GTFS/NeTEx/SIRI; Transmodel-based GraphQL.

Coverage: Finland + Estonia datasets; regional routers (HSL, Southwest Finland, Waltti).
Auth model: API key required; header or query param digitransit-subscription-key.
Formats: GraphQL; JSON; routing data uses GTFS files; realtime via GTFS-RT.
Rate limits: Rate/quota limiting enforced; avoid >10 req/s; 0.5-1s delay recommended.
Update frequency: Realtime via GTFS-RT; cadence not stated.
Licensing: CC BY 4.0 for Digitransit data; OSM-derived data under ODbL.

Auth model: No API key required; avoid excessive requests.
Rate limits: Not stated; avoid excessive requests; premium account may increase limits.
Licensing: License based on CC BY with additional terms (SL APIs on Trafiklab).
Pricing tiers: Premium account for higher limits mentioned; pricing not stated.

Auth model: Registration required; app_key query param via API portal.
Rate limits: Anonymous: 50 req/min; Product subscription: 500 req/min (higher on request).
Licensing: TfL Transport Data Service licence (based on OGL v2 with TfL amendments).
Pricing tiers: Free; higher quotas via product subscription.

Rate limits: 3 req/s per IP; 5 burst; 429 on exceed.
Update frequency: Not stated; caching headers indicate validity.

Auth model: Token-based auth via Authorization header; token from PTA.
Rate limits: Quota exists per token; limits not stated.
Licensing: Data from networks as open data; license varies by dataset.

Coverage: Switzerland public transport (unofficial; uses search.ch service).
Licensing: Not stated; API is unofficial and uses search.ch service.

Auth model: No API key; User-Agent required; contact before heavy usage; non-commercial use.
Rate limits: No numeric limits; contact before heavy usage (best-effort).
Update frequency: Static feeds checked daily; GTFS-RT polled once per minute.
Licensing: Usage policy restricts commercial use; data licenses vary by feed.
Pricing tiers: Free for non-commercial; contact for other use.
GTFS/NeTEx/SIRI support: GTFS + NeTEx for static; GTFS-RT for realtime.
